item.description:
This is not a movie meet up. But a benefit for the Haitian earthquake. It is sponsored by a member of this meetup and another Meet up group. It runs from 4:30 pm to 8:00 pm. There will be complimentary wines and hors d'oeurves, live performances, silent auction and goods for sale.

There is a suggested donation of $10.00

All proceeds will go to GHESKIO and the Christian Haitian Outreach.

www.gheskio.org and www.christianhatianoutreach.org
item.how_to_find_us: It's small. I'll be there, you can't miss me.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans
